messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase spending and improve it for everyone, to get the economy moving.
Help families and protect winter fuel payments, free bus passes, and eye test; deliver tax cuts for 16 million people and raise tax thresholds.
Make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe, keeping tax credits, improving Sure Start and providing 4,200 extra Sure Start health visitors.

issues.economy: Create 400,000 new apprenticeships, control over taxes and work pairings.
issues.education: Keeping tax credits, improve Sure Start.
issues.socialWelfare: Help families with budget by working with local councils to freeze council tax for two years, raise the basic state pension in line with earnings, and protect winter fuel payments, free bus passes, and eye tests.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm asking for your support today because I believe that the Conservative Party has the energy and ideas to change Britain. I personally commit and over the next five years, we'll increase spending and improve it for everyone.

quotes.text: The choice at this election is clear: five more years of Gordon Brownâ€™s tired government making things worse or change with the Conservatives.
